channel.title: Magic Mirror 3
channel.description: Image Perspective Transformation Plugin for Sketch

item.title: Magic Mirror 3 Release/3.5.8
item.description: Bug Fix

item.title: Magic Mirror 3 Release/3.5.7
item.description: v3.5.7 (43) Fixes crash for Sketch 50.2 and other bug fixes

item.title: Magic Mirror 3 Release/3.5.6
item.description: v3.5.6 (42) Fixes bug of crashes

item.title: Magic Mirror 3 Release/3.5.5
item.description: v3.5.5 (41) Fixes bug and fixes artboard selection drop down in alphabetical order

item.title: Magic Mirror 3 Release/3.5.4
item.description: v3.5.4 (40) Fixes for Sketch 49 right panel bug Fixes select No Artboard Crash Added "Include in Artboard" multiple state when multiple selection active

item.title: Magic Mirror 3 Release/3.5.2
item.description: v3.5.3 (39) Fixes for Sketch 49 Sort panel in alphabetical order Added tooltip for artboard dropdown menu displaying artboard name

item.title: Magic Mirror 3 Release/3.5.1
item.description: v3.5.1 (38) Bug fix and Support Midnight theme

item.title: Magic Mirror 3 Release/3.5.0
item.description: v3.5.0 (37) Performance improve and Prevent Sketch crash from plugin

item.title: Magic Mirror 3 Release/3.0.14
item.description: v3.0.14 (35) Fixed display problem for auto refresh toggle

item.title: Magic Mirror 3 Release/3.0.13
item.description: v3.0.13 (34) Added "Auto Artboard Refresh" option. Default is off.

item.title: Magic Mirror 3 Release/3.0.12
item.description: v3.0.12 (33) Auto update content In Sketch update enabled Bug fixes

item.title: Magic Mirror 3 Release/3.0.11
item.description: v3.0.11 (32) Fix for the Activation that blocks the free version usage

item.title: Magic Mirror 3 Release/3.0.10
item.description: v3.0.10 (31) Apply artboard on symbol Crash Fix

item.title: Magic Mirror 3 Release/3.0.9
item.description: v3.0.9 (30) Sketch 47 Crash Fix

item.title: Magic Mirror 3 Release/3.0.7
item.description:
v3.0.7 (29)
Added auto quality support for layers

item.title: Magic Mirror 3 (28)
item.description:
v3.0.6 (28)
Fix Magic Mirror 3 on High Sierra

item.title: Magic Mirror 3 (27)
item.description:
v3.0.5.1 (27)
Fix Magic Mirror 3 on High Sierra

item.title: Magic Mirror 3 (26)
item.description:
v3.0.5 (26)
- Fix crashes when applying actions on layers without artboard selected - Fix crashes when applying artboard to symbol instances (require Sketch 44+) - Fix issue when working with plugins using SketchXcodeTemplate

item.title: Magic Mirror 3 Release/3.0.4.6
item.description: Bug Fix

item.title: Magic Mirror 3 (25)
item.description:
v3.0.4.5 (25)
- Fix a crash when setting artboard in offline mode

item.title: Magic Mirror 3 Release/3.0.4.5
item.description: Bug Fix

item.title: Magic Mirror 3 (24)
item.description:
v3.0.4.4 (24)
- Fix crash on Sketch Beta 44

item.title: Magic Mirror 3 Release/3.0.4.4
item.description: Bug Fix

item.title: Magic Mirror 3 (23)
item.description:
v3.0.4.3 (23)
- Put Computation in Background - Soft Update Banner - Fix Weird Layout when Enabling Magic Mirror - Remove reclusive group fetching (faster) - Fix startup crash for 3.0.4 - Fix update crash when network can't be called

item.title: Magic Mirror 3 (20)
item.description:
v3.0.4 (20)
- Put Computation in Background - Soft Update Banner - Fix Weird Layout when Enabling Magic Mirror

item.title: Magic Mirror 3 Release/3.0.4
item.description: Bug Fix

item.title: Magic Mirror 3 (18)
item.description:
v3.0.3 (18)
- Fixed Not Showing Layers for Symbol Instance - Improve Performance when selecting Artboard - You can now include/exclude artboards even in multiple selection

item.title: Magic Mirror 3 Release/3.0.3
item.description: Bug Fix

item.title: Magic Mirror 3 (15)
item.description:
v3.0.2 (15)
- Crash fixes for license activation - Magic Mirror panel always visible - Refresh button refresh all artboard when no selection

item.title: Magic Mirror 3 (14)
item.description:
v3.0.1 (14)
- Better support for MM2 templates - New Include In Artboard Tutorial

item.title: Magic Mirror 3 Release/3.0.1
item.description: Bug Fix

item.title: Magic Mirror 3 (13)
item.description:
v3.0 (13)
- Reduce Layer List - Reduce Artboard List - Backwards compatible with MM2

item.title: Magic Mirror 3 Release/3.0
item.description: Bug Fix

item.title: Magic Mirror 3 Pre 2
item.description:
v3.0 Pre 2
Last version before public release.
- Fixed Offline Crash - Fixed Enable Magic Mirror causing crash - Better feedback after enabled/disabled

item.title: Magic Mirror 3 Pre 1
item.description:
v3.0 Pre 1
- Fix Crashes when Selecting No Artboard - Remove Activation Blockage - Add Support/Feedback Links

item.title: Magic Mirror 3 Beta 2
item.description:
Beta 2
- We are working very hard on performance enhancement, should feel much much faster :)
- We also have a fix on Sketch 42
Beta 1
- Toolbar now integrates with Sketch Inspector panel, finally no more floating around! - Improved image quality, as well as new 4x support! - Shapes with Corner Radius are supported! - Support Symbols! - Support Slices! - Type to Search for the target Artboard - Thumbnail Preview in the Artboard list Excluding specific Artboards on demand - Smart selection tool - etc…
Read Our Blog Post: https://blog.magicsketch.io/using-magic-mirror-3-37f27e044964

item.title: Magic Mirror 3 Beta 1
item.description:
Whole New Update
- Toolbar now integrates with Sketch Inspector panel, finally no more floating around! - Improved image quality, as well as new 4x support! - Shapes with Corner Radius are supported! - Support Symbols! - Support Slices! - Type to Search for the target Artboard - Thumbnail Preview in the Artboard list Excluding specific Artboards on demand - Smart selection tool - etc…
Read Our Blog Post: https://blog.magicsketch.io/using-magic-mirror-3-37f27e044964
